BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISLEG_CASE_REG_TRN (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_CASE_ID, STR_CASE_NUMBER, STR_CASE_TYPE, NUM_COURT_LEVEL_ID, NUM_COURT_ID, NUM_SUB_ID, STR_CASE_DESCRIPTION, STR_PETITIONER_EMP_CODE, STR_PETITIONER_NAME, STR_PETITIONER_ADDRESS, STR_DETAILS_OF_PETITION, DT_DATE_PETITION_FILED, STR_CASE_FILED_BY, NUM_FIRST_ADV_ID,DT_FROM_DATE_FIRST_ADV, NUM_SECOND_ADV_ID,DT_FROM_DATE_SEC_ADV, DT_CASE_FILED_ON_DATE, STR_BENCH, STR_CASE_FILE_NUMBER, STR_CASE_FILE_TITLE, STR_RESULT_STATUS, STR_CASE_STATUS, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,STR_CASE_FILED_AGAINST) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM PISLEG_CASE_REG_DTL A WHERE STR_CASE_ID=? AND STR_CASE_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PISLEG_CASE_REG_TRN SET STR_CASE_TYPE=?, NUM_COURT_LEVEL_ID=?, NUM_COURT_ID=?, NUM_SUB_ID=?, STR_CASE_DESCRIPTION=?, STR_PETITIONER_EMP_CODE=?, STR_PETITIONER_NAME=?, STR_PETITIONER_ADDRESS=?, STR_DETAILS_OF_PETITION=?, DT_DATE_PETITION_FILED=?, STR_CASE_FILED_BY=?, NUM_FIRST_ADV_ID=?,DT_FROM_DATE_FIRST_ADV=?, NUM_SECOND_ADV_ID=?,DT_FROM_DATE_SEC_ADV=?, DT_CASE_FILED_ON_DATE=?, STR_BENCH=?, STR_CASE_FILE_NUMBER=?, STR_CASE_FILE_TITLE=?, STR_RESULT_STATUS=?, STR_CASE_STATUS=?, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?, GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?, GNUM_ISVALID=?, GNUM_SEAT_ID=? WHERE STR_CASE_ID=? and STR_CASE_FILED_AGAINST=? AND STR_CASE_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISLEG_CASE_REG_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_CASE_ID=? AND STR_CASE_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISLEG_CASE_REG_DTL SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_CASE_ID=? AND STR_CASE_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISLEG_CASE_ADV_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_CASE_ID=? AND STR_CASE_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM PISLEG_CASE_ADV_TRN A WHERE STR_CASE_ID=? AND STR_CASE_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and ADVOCATE_TYPE=?
UPDATE PISLEG_CASE_ADV_TRN A SET A.DT_TO_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1) WHERE A.STR_CASE_ID=? AND A.STR_CASE_NUMBER=? AND A.SL_NO=? AND A.ADVOCATE_TYPE=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
